Singh Chetan is a Lion Faunus who graduated from Beacon Academy as a member of Team BSTR (Bistre), his partner being the Robin Faunus Robin Tearm. A disagreement with one of his teammates led to the team being disbanded, though Singh still works with the remaining two members.

(More TBA)

Appearance[]

Singh stands at 6'3", and has a tanned complexion from years in the sun. His Faunus trait is a pair of protractible claws that stem from his fingers.

(More TBA)

- Gold or red hair?

Current Outfit[]

TBA

Beacon Days[]

TBA

Personality[]

Singh is a passionate man, in the sense that he's very invested in many things he does and what he believes in. One of the things he's most passionate about is, of course, Faunus rights.

(More TBA)

- Kind of a hothead, especially in his younger years

- Independent

- Sees the WF as idiots and terrorists

History[]

Childhood[]

TBA

- Born in Vacuo

Beacon Academy[]

TBA

- Joins Team BSTR

- Refuses to join the (peaceful) White Fang

Betrayal[]

TBA

- Alev leaves the team

Fall of Beacon & Aftermath[]

TBA

Relationships[]

Bertram Arnold[]

During the early days of the team, Singh's independent streak led to some clashes between him and Bertram. Singh hated following orders, and he was especially annoyed that those orders came from someone who was the same age as him.

(More TBA)

Robin Tearm[]

TBA

Alev Ramón[]

Singh had plenty of arguments with Alev during their Beacon days, mostly over their differing beliefs. (More TBA)

Interestingly, Singh doesn't blame Alev for leaving. Rather, he blames the White Fang and their ideals. At the same time, as far as Singh is concerned, Alev has made his choice, and he would fight his former teammate without hesitation. (More TBA)

TBA

Semblance[]

TBA

Abilities[]

TBA

- Good at CQC

Trivia & Author's Notes[]

Singh is from Sanskrit sinha, meaning "lion".

Chetan means "visible, conscious, soul" in Sanskrit.
